transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Customer: Hello?

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Uh, ha, Akanksha baat kar rahi hai?

Customer: Hello. Ji, ma'am. Good afternoon. Executive: Ji, good afternoon. Main Vaishnavi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.

Customer: Okay, okay, ma'am. Executive: Ji, aapka call aaya tha hamare customer care pe. Uh, ma'am, aap ji, aapki services yaha pe hai na IndiaMART pe? To yaha pe paid services chalti hai aapki. To isme aap mujhse kya, kya help chah rahi thi, ek baar aap mujhe bataiye?

Customer: Aap mujhe iski saari cheeze bata dengi kya ye kaise work karta hai? And iski

Customer: Ha. Hmm. Bataiye. Executive: Pehle short mein, short mein main batau to aapka jo yaha par catalog hai, isme aapki jo uh service mein product line hai, yaha pe machine hai, right? Agriculture shredder hai, plant hai, hai na? Alag-alag machine hai. To aapke hi products catalog mein added hai pehle se. Aur usi se related aapko pan India se lead aayengi. Jisme likha hota hai ki buyer ko ye wala product chahiye. Jaise maan lijiye kisi client ko chahiye waste shredder. Theek hai? To

Customer: Ji, ma'am.

Customer: Ji, ma'am.

Customer: Ji, ma'am.

Executive: wo IndiaMART pe aata hai aur wo apni requirement post karta hai ki mujhe waste shredder chahiye. To as a lead hum aapko show karte hai. Theek hai? Hmm, hmm. Aur aapko, aapne jo package le rakha hai, uske according aap 17 lead purchase kar sakte hai one week mein. 17, 17. One week mein 17. Okay. Ha. To aap jaise maan lo aaj aapne do lead aapko pasand aayi ki ye buyer ki requirement hai industrial shredder ki, wood shredder ki, to do lead aapne kharidi. Aap jaise lead usko purchase karengi, do lead. To uska aapko phone number mil jayega, uska naam hoga, usme Gmail ID hogi. Agar aap chahe to use Gmail bhi kar sakte hai. Aur phone number, main to phone number hota hai, uska phone number bhi aapko mil jayega. To aap usse call karengi, apne company ke jo bhi product ke detail hai wo share karengi. Theek hai? Aur jo bhi aapka deal jis tarah se aap baat karti hai, buyer se baat karengi. Matlab hum buyer ka aapko number provide kar denge, uska detail provide kar denge. Theek hai?

Customer: Ji, ma'am. Ha.

Executive: Ha. Ek to ye ho gaya. Aur dusra kya hota hai ki aapko buyer ka saamne se call aur message bhi aata hai. Theek hai? Hmm. Jisme buyer apni lead nahi post kiya hai, usne directly aapko approach kar diya hai. Saamne se aapko call kar diya ya fir message kar diya. To wo data bhi aapko show hoga. Usme ma'am koi number fixed nahi hai. Jaise by lead mein hai na weekly 17 aapke package ke according. Ji. Lekin agar main baat karu jo direct aapko saamne se approach aata hai buyer ka, usme koi number nahi hota hai. Usme ho sakta hai aapko hafte mein 10 bhi aa gaya, 100 bhi aa gaya. Matlab usme koi number nahi hai. Theek hai? Saamne se call hua ya messages hua. Theek hai? Okay. Saamne se. Jaise hum saamne se agar hame bhejna hai to hum 17 ko bhej sakte hai?

Customer: Ji, ma'am.

Executive: Udhar se kitne bhi aa sakte hai?

Executive: Nahi, hello, idhar. Ha, ha, correct. Main ye keh rahi hu jo aap lead purchase kar rahi hai, usme 17 hai. Jo lead purchase ho rahi hai, by lead section mein. Hmm. Ha, isme aap open karenge na IndiaMART pe ek by lead karke ek section hai. Ji, ji, ma'am. Ji, ji, ma'am. Waha par aapko, ha, ha. Us section mein aapko per lead ek aapki lead cut ho jayegi. Theek hai? Hmm, hmm. Ab, ab ek lead manager waha pe ek option hoga, usme aaiye lead manager. Ji, ma'am. Isme saara data
